dcterms:creator: J. P. Thiran
G. Jaume
H. K. Ekenel
dcterms:description: FUNSD consists of 199 fully-annotated, noisy-scanned forms with various appearance and format which makes the form understanding task more challenging. The word spans in this dataset are annotated with three different labels: header, question and answer, and the rest words are annotated as other.
dcterms:title: FUNSD

dcterms:creator: S. Park
S. Shin
B. Lee
J. Lee
J. Surh
M. Seo
H. Lee
dcterms:description: CORD consists of about 1000 receipts with annotations of bounding boxes and textual contents. The word spans in this dataset are annotated with 30 different labels. The broad categories include menu, sub-total and total.
dcterms:title: CORD
